title: Learning Object-Based Mathematics Competency Assessment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning support, blended weekly online-offline classes (30% theory + 70% practice)

learning_goals: Learners can apply the three-stage (design-implementation-analysis) learning object evaluation framework to measure the effectiveness of mathematics educational materials.
Learners can assess learning object outcomes using statistical methods, including reliability and validity verification.
Learners can analyze the impact of learning object characteristics (interactive elements, visual organization) on academic achievement.

resources: Digital content library for math education
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
